summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.8°C) and outside temperature (down 3.7°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm) and cloud levels (up 657 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1606 m), and light levels (up 4489 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 656.8m lower than yesterday, 573.5m lower than the past week, 1606.1m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 1067.5m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1640.9m and 2670m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and winds will be practically absent. Possible light showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and some sunny spells will occur. Changeable conditions.
